valid: For the period 12:00 (UTC) on Wed 24 Sep 2025 to 12:00 (UTC) on Thu 25 Sep 2025
general_synopsis: Low 400 miles southwest of Iceland 992 expected just west of Iceland with little change by 0600 Thursday. High southern Norway 1035 slow-moving with little change by same time

Viking.text:
Wind
In west, southerly 4 or 5, occasionally 3 at first. In east, southeasterly, veering southerly, 2 to 4, occasionally 5 later.
Sea state
In west, moderate, occasionally slight in far south. in east, slight or moderate.
Weather
In west, fair. In east, fair.
Visibility
In west, good. In east, good.
